text: Events from the year 1806 in Russia ==Incumbents== * Monarch – Alexander I ==Events== * * * * * St Petersburg College for the Deaf * Saint-Petersburg Elizabethan Institute is founded. ==Births== * ==Deaths== * Elena von Rehbinder, industrialist * * * ==References== 1806 in Russia Category:Years of the 19th century in the Russian Empire
title: 1806 in Russia
